title: Traits
content:
Traits are descriptive words that appear on Ranger cards and path cards. They are found underneath the card's title and are listed in italics, following the card's type. Most traits don't have any rules effects inherently. Instead, they are referenced by other effects (for example "exhaust each Prey").

  • The “expert” trait is an exception which affects the rules for creating and customizing Ranger decks .
